block.create_integrated_farming.lava_fis: Like the Lava Fishing Rod, the Lava Fishing Net _can only_ _fish_ in _lava_.
create_integrated_farming.ponder.fishing: Whenever Fishing Nets are moved as part of an animated Contraption...
They will fish in open water, like a player fishing with a Fishing Rod
Fishing Net will catch small animal in water
create_integrated_farming.ponder.lava_fi: Using Lava Fishing Net on Contraptions
Whenever Lava Fishing Nets are moved as part of an animated Contraption...
They will fish in lava, like a player fishing with a Lava Fishing Rod
Lava Fishing Net will catch small animal in lava
create_integrated_farming.ponder.roost.c: Right-click a bird with the empty roost to catch it
Generally, baby birds cannot be caught
Alternatively, bird can be collected from their Spawners directly
create_integrated_farming.ponder.roost.f: Poultry can also be fed via Spout if there is suitable liquid food (from other mods)
create_integrated_farming.ponder.roost.l: Use a Lead to bring bird into the roost
The bird in the Roost can be brought out by Lead
Poultry feeding and poultry product collecting, see Ponder of Chicken Roost
create_integrated_farming.ponder.roost.r: For Poultry to produce, it must be fed
Conveyor belt allows feeding from the front of the Roost
Keep feeding to produce livestock products
create_integrated_farming.ponder.spout.c: Forgetting process of Leteos Compost can be speed up via Spout in ultra warm dimension
Degradation process of Organic Compost can be speed up via Spout
